title: UK Conservatives tend to reject Euro currency

content.prompt: Which of the following groups would most likely support Britain’s Conservative Party?

choices.label: Individuals who oppose the adoption of Europe’s common currency
Individuals who support a stronger National Health Service
Individuals in Northern Ireland who support the separatist movement

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
